lyrics_features.cleaned_text: I always seen you, just before the dawn When all the other kids, where just draggin' along I couldn't believe the way it seemed to be Rememberin' the things, you used to say to me (About) You know I can't be wastin' time Cause gotta get my fun I got to keep on movin' Can't stop 'til it's all done Listen when I tell ya, you got no time for fix Cause I just gotta make it, can't afford to miss And there's one reason, I'm tellin' you this I feels bad And I'm lookin' for a kiss Why wontcha tell me, why those kids are movin' so slow Is it just because they don't have no place to go When the day starts breakin', the sun is gonna shine It's hard to sleep, when I been cryin' (And) All you ladies are on Your way to church (I'm beggin') Will I just be a' roamin' Lookin' turn to a search Listen when I tell ya, you got no time for fix Cause I just gotta make it, can't afford to miss And there's one reason, I'm tellin' you this I feels bad And I'm lookin' for a kiss Well I been lookin' for a real hot kiss You think it's bad, but you know that it's true So why don't let me live baby When I'm lookin' for a kiss When everyone goes to your house, they shoot up in your room Most of them are beautiful, but so obsessed with gloom I ain't gonna be here, when they all get home They're always lookin' at me, they won't leave me alone I didn't come here, lookin' for no fix (I know) I been houndin' the street all night late baby Justa lookin' for a kiss I need fix and a kiss I didn't come here, lookin' for no fix (I know) I been haulin' booty, all night long Just lookin' for a kiss
